info.name: Project Management API
info.description: Complete API collection for the Project Management System

request.description: Login user and get JWT tokens
Refresh access token using refresh token
Confirm and enable 2FA after verifying code
Get details of a specific Celery task
Create a new model-based Celery task
Create a new generic Celery task
Get the result of a completed task
Get the current status of a task
Get available fields for a specific model
Assign a role to a user
Get roles assigned to the current user
Import project data from JSON file
Export project data to JSON file
Import task data from JSON file
Export task data to JSON file
Import organization data from JSON file
Export organization data to JSON file
Import multiple data types in a single operation
Export multiple data types in a single operation

body.raw:
{
    "content_type": "project/project",
    "name": "Project Import/Export",
    "description": "Configuration for importing and exporting projects",
    "field_mapping": {
        "title": "Title",
        "description": "Description",
        "start_date": "Start Date",
        "end_date": "End Date",
        "status": "Status",
        "priority": "Priority",
        "owner": "Owner ID",
        "organization": "Organization ID"
    }
}
